data.title: LATEST NEWS – Oratel PTY Limited
data.text:
Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)

ERP or Enterprise Resource Planning when properly planned for and successfully implemented provides a uniform, central database on a common computing platform that serves to consolidate all business facets into a cohesive enterprise-wide system. All of the core functions of an enterprise regardless of the business model will be encapsulated into the following ERP components:

Transactional Elements

Financials

Distribution

Human Resources

Product Lifecycle Management

Advanced Applications

Customer Relationship Management (CRM)

Supply Chain Management

Purchasing

Manufacturing

Distribution

Warehouse Management (WMS)

Management Portal/Dashboard

Decision Support System

In providing the ERP solution, Oratel (Pty) Ltd uses the Oracle e Business suite. This is widely used, thoroughly tested and stable. Clients can be assured that their ERP implementation or upgrade will be smooth and reliable.

Customer Relations Management (CRM)

CRM or Customer Relations Management is another key area in any successful enterprise and Oratel (Pty) Ltd provides the very best solution in this critical function. All interactions a client has with customers and sales prospects can be organized and synchronized automatically with a properly implemented CRM strategy. The extensively used, widely trusted Siebel software forms the basis of a CRM implementation or upgrade performed by Oratel (Pty) Ltd .

Product Life Cycle Management (PLM)

PLM or Product Life Cycle Management is another cornerstone of a company’s information technology structure. There are numerous benefits to a properly implemented PLM:

Reduced time to market

Enhanced product quality

Better response time in identifying sales opportunities

Reduced cost for prototyping

Reduced waste

Use of data for multiple projects

Integration of engineering workflows to reduce costs

The focus of PLM is the synchronization of business processes, people and methodology as much as it is about software and it is precisely in this area that Oracle excels with a long track record of successful implementations. Oracle’s software of choice in this area of expertise is Siebel.

Demand Management (DM)

DM or Demand Management is the appropriate solution to meet any client’s need to be more demand driven, to increase forecast accuracy or to converge quickly on a consensus forecast to drive their supply chain planning process. DM assists clients in improving their management of product lifecycles, promotions and other events. Oratel (Pty) Ltd prefers Oracle’s Demantra Demand Management solution to enable clients to sense demand real time and shape demand for profitability. With the Oracle solution Oratel allows clients to become more demand driven with higher service levels and sales, more satisfied customers and lower inventory and distribution costs.

Hyperion Enterprise

Oracle’s Enterprise Performance Management stack is a proven commercial-off-the-shelf (COTS) application that improves departmental financial consolidation and reporting efficiency by streamlining the collection, consolidation and reporting of financial results in a global environment. We have the unique ability to orchestrate all the EPM building blocks (listed below) for their intended purpose which will enable you to provide a world class service to internal clients:

HFM: Hyperion Financial Management

HP: Hyperion Planning

HSF: Hyperion Strategic Finance

Essbase

FDM: Financial Data Quality Management

Oracle Business Intelligence Suite

Oracle Business Intelligence Suite Enterprise Edition or OBIEE is a solution used by Oratel (Pty) Ltd . This comprehensive suite of enterprise business intelligence (BI) products delivers a full range of capabilities, including interactive dashboards, full ad hoc queries, proactive intelligence and alerts, enterprise and financial reporting, real time predictive intelligence, disconnected analytics and more. The products in the suite are based on proven Web service-oriented architecture that integrates with an organization’s existing information technology (IT) infrastructure for the lowest total cost of ownership (TCO). The solution, backed by Oratel’s expert implementation provides complete, relevant insight to everyone in an organization and that, in turn, results in better decisions, informed actions and more efficient business process.

Convergent Billing

Convergent Billing, a solution provided by Oratel (Pty) Ltd using the Single.eView software, includes support for multiple service types, voice, data and multimedia. The aim of convergent billing is to create a single bill and statement for all services in the telecommunications sphere. A client is able to control services and manage balances in real time. This can greatly reduce revenue leakage, increase marketing flexibility and create revenue growth. With the proper implementation of a convergent billing system Oratel assists the client in reducing OPEX.

Next Generation Service Fulfillment

Next Generation Service Fulfillment using Metasolv ASAP is the final product in the specialist range provided by Oratel (Pty) Ltd. In order to bring new services to the market in next generation time convergent service providers need a solution to originate and fulfill services, including all processes from order to network. With Oratel (Pty) Ltd a client can ensure it has the ability to design, deliver and assure new services at high speeds whilst maintaining the simplest possible OSS.

Testing Accelerators for EBS

Enterprise applications are characterized by their broad scope and complexity: a small change could result in enterprise wide failure. Oratel (Pty) Ltd specialize in using Testing Accelerators for EBS to overcome these challenges with integrated EBS solutions for functional and automated EBS testing. The unique value proposition is that our EBS Subject Matter Experts compile, execute and maintain tailored test cases on your behalf without you having to invest in any software.
